name: War of the ages
description:
War of ages

Death of your king doesn't mean the end of the kingdom! Its the beginning of new age, new conquests and victories!

In War of ages you controle blue kingdom and conquer new castles! The war is long and every minute all kings are replaced with new kings,  giving you new perks. Making your troops movment speed faster or making new recruits quicker in alll your castles.

The game has 3 maps:

  • 1v1
  • 1v1v1
  • 1v1v1v1

Every new game generates new kings for each player, which gives the game some replayability and diffrent kingdom experience. 

King provides the following  stats:

  • Production speed bonus: extra productions speed on top of building production speed in wich new units  are produced
  • Starving speed: when there are too much units in castle, they begin to starve, which is determined by the building type and king
  • Max unit capacity: extra unit capacity on top of building capacity
  • Movment speed bonus: extra movment speed for units while moving

Hope you enjoy and get some laughs from this "AI" :)

PS: game doesnt tell you when you lose (so you can watch NPCs), so you will have to quit to menu manually when you dont have buildings left
